00022 void setupItem(ListboxTextItem* item)
00023 {
00024     item->setSelectionBrushImage((CEGUI::utf8*)"TaharezLook", (CEGUI::utf8*)"ListboxSelectionBrush");
00025     item->setSelectionColours(colour(1.0, 0, 0, 1.0));
00026     item->setAutoDeleted(true);
00027 }

00029 bool quitButtonPushed(const EventArgs& e)
00030 {
00031     SimulationManager::get()->stop();
00032     SystemManager::get()->quitNextUpdate();
00033     return true;
00034 }
00035 
00036 bool environmentChanged(const EventArgs& e)
00037 {
00038     list<string> simulations = SimulationManager::get()->getEnvironment(
00039                                string(GuiManager::get()->getCombobox("environmentSelector")->getSelectedItem()->getText().c_str())
00040                                )->getFileNames();
00041     Listbox* box = GuiManager::get()->getListbox("simulations");
00042     box->resetList();
00043 
00044     list<string>::const_iterator iter;
00045 
00046     for (iter = simulations.begin(); iter != simulations.end(); ++iter)
00047     {
00048         ListboxTextItem* item = new ListboxTextItem(*iter);
00049         setupItem(item);
00050         box->addItem(item);
00051     }
00052 
00053     return true;
00054 }
00055 
00056 bool loadButtonPushed(const EventArgs& e)
00057 {
00058     Listbox* box = GuiManager::get()->getListbox("simulations");
00059     if (box->getFirstSelectedItem() != NULL)
00060     {
00061         SimulationManager::get()->setActiveEnvironment(string(GuiManager::get()->getCombobox("environmentSelector")->getSelectedItem()->getText().c_str()));
00062         SimulationManager::get()->getActiveEnvironment()->loadSimulation(string(box->getFirstSelectedItem()->getText().c_str()));
00063     }
00064     return true;
00065 }
00066 
00067 bool pauseButtonPushed(const EventArgs& e)
00068 {
00069     if (SimulationManager::get()->isActive())
00070     {
00071         if (SimulationManager::get()->isPaused())
00072         {
00073             GuiManager::get()->getButton("pauseButton")->setText("Pause");
00074             SimulationManager::get()->unpause();
00075         }
00076         else
00077         {
00078             GuiManager::get()->getButton("pauseButton")->setText("Resume");
00079             SimulationManager::get()->pause();
00080         }
00081     }
00082     return true;
00083 }
00084 
00085 bool setTimeButtonPushed(const EventArgs& e)
00086 {
00087     Combobox* selector = GuiManager::get()->getCombobox("timeFactors");
00088     if (selector->getText() != "")
00089     {
00090         double enteredFactor = Utils::get()->stringToDouble(selector->getText().c_str());
00091 
00092         if (!enteredFactor > 0)
00093             enteredFactor = 1;
00094 
00095         SimulationManager::get()->setTimeFactor(enteredFactor);
00096     }
00097 
00098     return true;
00099 }

00102 {
00103     manager = SimulationManager::get();

00106 SimulationState::~SimulationState()

00108     delete manager;

00111 void SimulationState::createScene()
00112 {
00113     GuiManager* gui = GuiManager::get();
00114     gui->loadLayout("..\\resources\\gui\\layouts\\simulation.layout");
00115 
00116     gui->getButton("quitButton")->subscribeEvent(PushButton::EventClicked, Event::Subscriber(&quitButtonPushed));
00117     gui->getButton("loadButton")->subscribeEvent(PushButton::EventClicked, Event::Subscriber(&loadButtonPushed));
00118     gui->getButton("pauseButton")->subscribeEvent(PushButton::EventClicked, Event::Subscriber(&pauseButtonPushed));
00119     gui->getButton("setTimeFactorButton")->subscribeEvent(PushButton::EventClicked, Event::Subscriber(&setTimeButtonPushed));
00120 
00121     Combobox* selector = gui->getCombobox("environmentSelector");
00122     selector->setReadOnly(true);
00123 
00124     map<string, Environment*> environments = manager->getEnvironments();
00125     map<string, Environment*>::const_iterator iter1;
00126 
00127     for (iter1 = environments.begin(); iter1 != environments.end(); ++iter1)
00128     {
00129         ListboxTextItem* item = new ListboxTextItem(iter1->second->getType());
00130         setupItem(item);
00131         selector->addItem(item);
00132     }
00133 
00134     selector->subscribeEvent(Combobox::EventListSelectionAccepted, Event::Subscriber(&environmentChanged));
00135 
00136     selector = gui->getCombobox("timeFactors");
00137     selector->setReadOnly(true);
00138 
00139     ListboxTextItem* item = new ListboxTextItem(".25");
00140     setupItem(item);
00141 
00142     selector->addItem(item);
00143 
00144     item = new ListboxTextItem(".5");
00145     setupItem(item);
00146 
00147     selector->addItem(item);
00148 
00149     item = new ListboxTextItem("1");
00150     setupItem(item);
00151 
00152     selector->addItem(item);
00153 
00154     item = new ListboxTextItem("2");
00155     setupItem(item);
00156 
00157     selector->addItem(item);
00158 
00159     item = new ListboxTextItem("5");
00160     setupItem(item);
00161 
00162     selector->addItem(item);
00163 
00164     item = new ListboxTextItem("10");
00165     setupItem(item);
00166 
00167     selector->addItem(item);
00168 
00169     item = new ListboxTextItem("20");
00170     setupItem(item);
00171 
00172     selector->addItem(item);
00173 
00174     manager->start();
00175 }

00180     SceneManager::get()->clearScene();
